Date: {{ doc.transfer_date }}

To

{{ doc.custom_salutation }} {{ doc.employee_name }},

{{ doc.custom_designation }} - {{ doc.department }}, {{ doc.custom_sub_department }}

{{ doc.custom_branch }}

Subject: Letter of Transfer

Dear {{ doc.custom_first_name }},

{% if doc.transfer_details and doc.transfer_details|length %}

This is to inform you that as per the management directives, your services are being transferred to {{ doc.transfer_details | map(attribute='new') | reject('equalto', None) | join(', ') }} , w.e.f. from {{ doc.transfer_date }}.

{% endif %}

All the other terms and conditions remain unchanged as per your Appointment Letter.

We are sure you will make best use of the opportunity offered to you and contribute substantially to the success of our organization as you have done in the past and fully justify the confidence placed in you by the management.

Please sign the duplicate copy of this letter as a token of acceptance of the same.

With Best Wishes,

{{ doc.custom_current_user }}

HR Manager

I have received a copy of this letter and have read and understood its contents.
